value.string: ------- STEP: 3. Check the logs folder and create the log file if it is not existent
3.0 Get the log folder path from config file
3.1 If folder does not exists, then create one
3.3 if log file does not exist, then create one
"Timestamp","Log Level","BOT Name","Message","Error Line Number","Error Description","More Details"
3.4 if log file exists but the size of the log file is above 20 MB, then archieve the current one and create a new one
"Timestamp","Log Level","BOT Name","Message","Error Line Number","Error Description","More Details"
------- STEP: 3. Read configurations from config.xml file
_________________ Get the YYYYMMDD format for src fldr __________________
